name: moltbot-selfhosted
description: Self-hosted Moltbot AI assistant via Cloudflare Tunnel - No R2/Browser Rendering needed

SELFHOSTED_URL.description: Your Tunnel internal URL. Format: `https://<TUNNEL_ID>.cfargotunnel.com`. Get Tunnel ID with `cloudflared tunnel info <tunnel-name>`.

MOLTBOT_GATEWAY_TOKEN.description: Gateway access token. Must match the token in your server's `.env` file. Generate with `openssl rand -hex 32`.

CF_ACCESS_TEAM_DOMAIN.description: Your Cloudflare Access team domain (e.g., `myteam.cloudflareaccess.com`). Find in Zero Trust Dashboard.

CF_ACCESS_AUD.description: Your Access Application's Audience (AUD) Tag. Find in Access → Applications → Your App → Overview.
